grid.title: RelatÃ³rio de Ruptura por SKU
grid.expression: SELECT DISTINCT PRO.CODPROD AS Codigo, PRO.MARCA AS Marca, RTRIM(PRO.DESCRPROD) + ' ' + RTRIM(ISNULL(PRO.COMPLDESC,'')) AS Produto, PRO.CODVOL AS Unidade, ISNULL(PRO.ESTMIN,0) AS EstoqueMinimo, sankhya.FN_ESTOQUE_INOVACAO(PRO.CODPROD) AS Saldo FROM sankhya.TGFPRO PRO WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN sankhya.AD_PRODUTOLOJA P WITH (NOLOCK) ON P.CODPROD = PRO.CODPROD WHERE PRO.ATIVO = 'S' AND P.ATIVO = 'SIM' AND CODVOL != 'KT' AND (sankhya.FN_ESTOQUE_INOVACAO(pro.codprod) < 1.00)
